== Logging In ==

{{{
gdc login -c your-client-id -s your-client-secret -u optional-default-username
}}}

{{{
gdc login --client-id your-client-id --client-secret your-client-secret --username optional-default-username
}}}

== Logging Out ==

{{{
gdc logout
}}}
